hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select idea.* from ip_idea idea where idea.idea_user_id=:id

select idea.* from ip_idea idea where idea.idea_user_id=:id union select idea.* from ip_idea idea, ip_group_user igu, ip_idea_group iig where igu.gu_usr_id=:id and igu.gu_grp_id=iig.ig_grp_id and iig.ig_idea_id=idea.idea_id union select idea.* from ip_idea idea where idea.idea_id not in (select iig.ig_idea_id from ip_idea_group iig)
select idea.* from ip_idea idea where idea.idea_status=:status

select idea.* from ip_idea idea where idea.idea_user_id=:id and idea.idea_status=:sid union select idea.* from ip_idea idea, ip_group_user igu, ip_idea_group iig where igu.gu_usr_id=:id and igu.gu_grp_id=iig.ig_grp_id and iig.ig_idea_id=idea.idea_id and idea.idea_status=:sid union select idea.* from ip_idea idea where idea.idea_id not in (select iig.ig_idea_id from ip_idea_group iig) and idea.idea_status=:sid
